title: The AI-Robot Brain (NVIDIA Isaac™) Overview
description: Dive into the NVIDIA Isaac platform, a comprehensive suite of tools, software, and hardware designed to accelerate AI-powered robotics. This module covers advanced perception, simulation, and autonomous capabilities, leveraging Isaac Sim and Isaac ROS to bring intelligent Physical AI applications to life.
